item1.title: Cashew Nuts
item1.desc: Premium-grade cashew nuts carefully sourced for their rich flavor, creamy texture, and high nutritional value. Ideal for roasting, confectionery, healthy snacks, and food manufacturing.

item2.title: Premium Cloves
item2.desc: Hand-picked Tanzanian cloves known for their strong aroma and rich essential oils. Perfect for food processing, herbal blends, and pharmaceutical use.

item3.title: PONTE MARKA
item3.desc: PONTE MARKA is a leading exporter and supplier of premium agricultural products, specializing in cashews, cloves, beans, and cardamom. Committed to quality, sustainability, and sourcing directly from Tanzanian farms.

item4.title: Premium Speckled Beans
item4.desc: Popular speckled beans available in purple or brown mottled varieties. Known for their attractive appearance, good swelling capacity, and strong market demand. Cultivated across multiple regions in Tanzania.

item5.title: Black Pepper
item5.desc: Naturally sun-dried black pepper with bold aroma and high piperine levels. Suitable for spice processors, wholesalers, and premium retail packaging.

item6.title: Dried Green Cardamom
item6.desc: Naturally sun-dried green cardamom pods with a rich, aromatic flavor. Uniform and bright green, ideal for spice processors and premium packaging.

about.title: Ponte Marka: Trading and Industry Company Limited
about.storyText: Marka Trading and Industry Company Limited is a Tanzania-Italy based agro-food export company with over 7 years of experience. We connect African agricultural excellence with international markets, ensuring certified quality, sustainable sourcing, and reliable logistics for global importers.
points: Transparency and long-term trust with every business partner.
Compliance with ISO, phytosanitary, fumigation, and export standards.
Built on years of consistent cooperation in Tanzania and Italy.
Strong local roots—operating with global standards.

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc: To be the bridge of excellence connecting Tanzania's natural richness to global markets, ensuring every product tells a story of quality, sustainability, and international cooperation.

mission.title: Mission
mission.desc: To cultivate, select, and export premium sisal fibers, cashew nuts, and spices, managing the full supply chain from land to shipment with rigorous phytosanitary standards.

integrity.title: Integrity & Trust
integrity.desc: We uphold absolute transparency and build long-term trust with every business partner, fostering reliable and enduring international relationships.

quality.title: Certified Quality
quality.desc: Strict adherence to international standards including ISO, Phytosanitary, Fumigation, and Export compliance ensures premium product quality.

glocal.title: Glocal Approach
glocal.desc: Strong local roots in Tanzania combined with global operational standards guarantee sustainable and professional business practices.

responsive.title: Responsive & Multilingual
responsive.desc: Our website is fully responsive across all devices and supports multiple languages: English, Italian, and Arabic for international accessibility.

gallery.sectionSubtitle: Explore our fields, harvests, and production processes—showcasing the premium quality of our agricultural products and our commitment to excellence.

cashew.tagline: Crunchy and naturally sweet. Selected for size and outturn.
cashew.description: We export raw and processed cashew nuts of the highest quality. Our supply chain guarantees healthy nuts with high outturn rates, perfect for roasting and the Italian and European confectionery industry.
cashew.technicalSpecs:
- Grades (Kernels): W180, W210, W240, W320 (Whole White), Splits, Pieces
- Outturn: 48-53+ lbs per sack (Raw Nuts)
- Nut Count: 170-200 per kg
- Moisture: Max 8-10%
- Defects: < 5%

cloves.tagline: The aromatic essence of Zanzibar. Hand-picked and sun-dried.
cloves.description: Our cloves are famous for their high essential oil content and rich reddish-brown color. Carefully cleaned and sorted to ensure they are free from stems and impurities.
cloves.technicalSpecs:
- Quality: CG1 (Hand-picked), CG2
- Moisture: < 12%
- Stems: Max 2-3%
- Foreign Matter: < 0.5%
- Essential Oils: High Content

beans.tagline: Plant-based proteins from the heart of Africa. Soya, White, Yellow, Red Kidney, Black, and Speckled/Pinto Beans.
beans.description: A wide range of legumes cultivated on fertile soils. Includes small to medium White Beans (Navy/Cannellini), large Red Kidney Beans, oval/round Yellow Beans, small Black Beans, and speckled Pinto Beans. Essential, clean, and ready for packaging or processing. Main production: Great Lakes/Western (Kagera & Kigoma), Southern Highlands (Mbeya, Iringa), Northern regions (Arusha, Kilimanjaro, Manyara), and multiple other regions.
beans.technicalSpecs:
- Types: Soya Beans, White Beans, Yellow Kidney, Red Kidney, Black Beans, Speckled/Pinto, Pigeon Peas (Caiano)
- Size: Uniform to varied depending on type
- Moisture: Max 13-14%
- Impurities (Admixture): Max 1-2% (Machine Cleaned)
- Insect Damage: Max 1%

cardamom.tagline: Top-grade green cardamom pods, tightly closed and bright green, grown in rainforest shade.
cardamom.description: Offers a complex flavor combining sweetness and spice. Cardamom Husks: Outer husks separated from seeds, ideal for flavoring tea, Arabic coffee, ground spice blends, or essential oil extraction at economical cost.
cardamom.technicalSpecs:
- Grade: AGEB (Extra Bold), Bold
- Color: Deep Green
- Size: 6mm - 8mm+
- Seeds: Black and aromatic
- Purity: Cleaned from dust
- Aroma: Light and balsamic
- Usage: Tea industry, oil extraction

blackpepper.tagline: Premium black pepper from Tanga, naturally sun-dried to preserve piperine.
blackpepper.description: Dark, wrinkled grains with a penetrating aroma, perfect for the food industry and retail.
blackpepper.technicalSpecs:
- Density: 500GL - 550GL (grams/liter)
- Moisture: Max 12%
- Appearance: Whole, clean grains (de-stoned)
- Salmonella: Tested and absent
